turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm at the 5th & Columbia Starbucks in Seattle, Washington. I am trying to place an order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get an espresso macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can I get it with whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a solo espresso macchiato with whole milk to be picked up at the starbucks on 5th and colombia, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.
